subject: Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: Ian Stannard of Britain beat the Belgian rider Greg Van Avermaet in a two-way sprint finish to win the Ghent-Ghent Nieuwsblad race, the opening classic of the Belgian spring season.
snippet: Ian Stannard of Britain beat the Belgian rider Greg Van Avermaet in a two-way sprint finish to win the Ghent-Ghent Nieuwsblad race, the opening classic of the Belgian spring season.
